actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to name the Jamaica Bay Wildlife Refuge portion of the Gateway National Recreation Area, Queens, New York, the "Herbert Johnson Wildlife Refuge".

summary.text: Designates the Jamaica Bay Wildlife Refuge portion of the Gateway National Recreation Area, in the City of New York, as the Herbert Johnson Wildlife Refuge.

titles.title: A bill to name the Jamaica Bay Wildlife Refuge portion of the Gateway National Recreation Area, Queens, New York, the "Herbert Johnson Wildlife Refuge".
